name: Snow Jump (scalybob)
description:
SNOW JUMP is a christmas jumper game, like doodle jump. Move Snowbob the snowman left/right to keep jumping up the platforms, collecting crystals for extra score and see how long you can survive. 3 different types of platforms - normal, extra bouncy and ice crack (don't stay on these ones too long). Player auto jumps.

FEATURES:

⛄ Animated character to play as.
🎵 Cool sound effects and music.
🕹️ Simple controls (support touchscreen, mouse or arrowkeys).
😲 The game gets harder the longer you survive.
💯 Share your best score and compete with friends.


DEVICE/CONTENT INFO:

🔹 Works on phones, tablets and Chromebooks (that support Android).
🔹 Small download size.
🔹 No notifications.
🔹 No in-app purchases.
🔹 No banner adverts distracting you during gameplay.
🔹 No permissions requested.
🔹 No personal data recorded or used.
🔹 No violent content, bad language or inappropriate adverts.


🆓 Snow Jump is a 100% free christmas jumper game like doodle jump, so download it today and get jumping. 🆓

Please leave a rating in the playstore with your feedback.

If you like this game, please check out the other free games by Scaly Bob.
